sentences.en: China has always been known as a land of propriety and righteousness.
sentences.cn: 中国从来以礼义之邦著称。

sentences.en: China has always been known as a land of propriety band righteousness.
sentences.cn: 中国从来以礼义之邦著称.

sentences.en: He has an innate propriety and simplicity of taste, which in general direct him perfectly right.
sentences.cn: 他有一种天赋的恰当,朴素的感受能力, 这通常总使他的看法完全正确.

sentences.en: His marriage and family life is a model of propriety.
sentences.cn: 他的婚姻和家庭生活都是规规矩矩的。

sentences.en: I doubt the propriety of doing so.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑这样做是否适当.

sentences.en: I doubt the propriety of such a remark.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑这样的话是否得体.

sentences.en: I doubt the propriety of the term.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑这个术语是否适当.

sentences.en: In male company, perhaps he did overstep the bounds of propriety.
sentences.cn: 在清一色男性的公司里，可能他的举止确实有失得体。

sentences.en: Nobody questioned the propriety of her being there alone.
sentences.cn: 没人认为她只身出现在那里不得体。

sentences.en: Propriety has nothing to do with reasons.
sentences.cn: 恰当和明智是毫不相干的.

sentences.en: The boy hadn't much sense of propriety, he well knew.
sentences.cn: 他这“多多头”的小儿子不老成, 他知道.

sentences.en: The propriety of her deeds was doubtful.
sentences.cn: 她的行为是否得体却是很可怀疑的.

sentences.en: Their sense of social propriety is eroded.
sentences.cn: 他们的社交礼仪意识淡薄。

sentences.en: Things seemed arranged with more propriety even than in the kingdom of Heaven.
sentences.cn: 这里的一切似乎都要排得正正经经,胜过了天国.

sentences.en: We hesitated at the propriety of the method.
sentences.cn: 我们对这种办法是否适用拿不定主意.

trans.tran_en: correctness of social or moral behaviour
